adaptive_upgrade.name: Adaptive Upgrade
adaptive_upgrade.description: You have learned to use your body's unique construction to adapt to new situations. You can install one additional augmentation (cybernetic or biotech) into your body. This augmentation can't be of a type that you already have.

barricade.name: Barricade
barricade.description: You can create cover from almost anything. As a move action, you can stack and reinforce objects that are too small or too fragile to provide cover on their own.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
bodyguard.description: Your swift strikes ward off enemies attacking nearby allies. When an adjacent ally is attacked, you can use a reaction to grant that ally a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against that attack.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: You can strike two adjacent foes with a single swing. As a standard action, you can make a single melee attack against a foe within reach.

combat_casting.name: Combat Casting
combat_casting.description: You are adept at casting spells in combat. You gain a +4 bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity provoked by casting a spell.

combat_reflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
combat_reflexes.description: You can respond rapidly to threats. You can make a number of additional attacks of opportunity per round equal to your Dexterity bonus.

connection_inkling.name: Connection Inkling
connection_inkling.description: You have formed a tenuous connection to a cosmic power. Choose a mystic connection. You gain the 1st-level connection power for that connection.

deadly_aim.name: Deadly Aim
deadly_aim.description: You can make exceptionally deadly ranged attacks by pinpointing a foe's vital spots, at the expense of making the attack less likely to succeed.

enhanced_resistance.name: Enhanced Resistance
enhanced_resistance.description: Your body is adept at resisting ailments. Choose two of the following: bleed, blind, deafen, disease, poison, or sleep. You gain a +4 enhancement bonus to saving throws against effects that cause those conditions.

extra_resolve.name: Extra Resolve
extra_resolve.description: You have more resolve than others. You gain 2 additional Resolve Points.

far_shot.name: Far Shot
far_shot.description: You remain accurate at longer ranges. You take only a –1 penalty per full range increment between you and your target when using a ranged weapon.

great_fortitude.name: Great Fortitude
great_fortitude.description: You are resistant to poisons, diseases, and other maladies. You gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

improved_combat_maneuver.name: Improved Combat Maneuver
improved_combat_maneuver.description: You are skilled at performing a specific combat maneuver. Choose one combat maneuver (bull rush, dirty fighting, disarm, grapple, reposition, sunder, or trip) when you gain this feat.

improved_initiative.name: Improved Initiative
improved_initiative.description: Your quick reflexes allow you to react rapidly to danger. You gain a +4 bonus to initiative checks.

iron_will.name: Iron Will
iron_will.description: You are more resistant to mental effects. You gain a +2 bonus to Will saving throws.

jet_dash.name: Jet Dash
jet_dash.description: You can fly in short bursts. Twice per day, you can fly up to your fly speed as a move action.

lightning_reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
lightning_reflexes.description: You have faster reflexes than normal. You gain a +2 bonus to Reflex saving throws.

mobility.name: Mobility
mobility.description: You can weave through foes' defenses when moving. You gain a +4 bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity that you provoke by leaving a threatened square.

multi_weapon_fighting.name: Multi-Weapon Fighting
multi_weapon_fighting.description: You know how to fight with several lighter weapons at once, as opposed to using a single heavier weapon.

nimble_moves.name: Nimble Moves
nimble_moves.description: You can move across a single obstacle with ease. Whenever you move, you can move through up to 5 feet of difficult terrain each round as if it were normal terrain.

penetrating_attack.name: Penetrating Attack
penetrating_attack.description: Your attacks are particularly penetrating. Your attacks ignore 5 points of damage reduction, unless the damage reduction is without a type (such as DR 10/—).

skill_focus.name: Skill Focus
skill_focus.description: You are particularly adept at a certain skill. Choose a skill. You gain a +3 insight bonus to checks with that skill.

spell_focus.name: Spell Focus
spell_focus.description: Choose a school of magic (such as illusion). Add +1 to the DC for all saving throws against spells from the school of magic you select.

spell_penetration.name: Spell Penetration
spell_penetration.description: Your spells are especially potent, breaking through spell resistance more readily than normal. You gain a +2 bonus to caster level checks to overcome spell resistance.

step_up.name: Step Up
step_up.description: You can close the distance when a foe tries to move away. Whenever an adjacent foe attempts to take a guarded step away from you, you can also take a guarded step as a reaction.

toughness.name: Toughness
toughness.description: You have enhanced physical stamina. You gain 4 Stamina Points. In addition, the DC of Constitution checks to continue running is only 10 + your number of previous checks, instead of 10 + 2 × your number of previous checks.

weapon_focus.name: Weapon Focus
weapon_focus.description: Choose one weapon type (small arms, longarms, heavy weapons, etc.). You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with weapons of the selected type.

weapon_specialization.name: Weapon Specialization
weapon_specialization.description: Choose one weapon type (small arms, longarms, heavy weapons, etc.). You gain a bonus equal to half your character level to damage rolls with weapons of the selected type.
